content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
AFFIDAVIT OF JANE DOE
I, Jane Doe, being duly sworn, depose and say:
1. I am over the age of 18 and competent to make this affidavit based on my personal knowledge.
2. I am currently employed as a paralegal at the Law Offices of Smith & Jones, located at 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.
3. On April 1, 2023, I was asked by Attorney John Smith to prepare an affidavit in support of Plaintiff's Motion for Summary Judgment in the matter of Doe v. Acme Corp., Case No. 22-cv-1234 (S.D.N.Y.).
4. I hereby certify that the foregoing statements made by me are true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I am aware that if any of the foregoing statements made by me are willfully false, I am subject to punishment.
Dated: April 15, 2023
Jane Doe
Sworn to before me this
15th day of April, 2023
Notary Public
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
